attributes.description:
2011 BMW Z4 SDRIVE35I, FULL SERVICE HISTORY, ONLY 137 000 KM’S, IMMACULATE CONDITION SELLING FOR R 309 950.00. 
BEEEG engine small body, that’s how we like it. This is one of the hottest Z4 35I’s I have come across in a long time. The previous owner was meticulous in maintaining and looking after this vehicle. He has added some very unique touches to the car and I must say I love it, we couldn’t have done it any better ourselves. 
This is a very rare Z4, Why you ask? Because it’s the 35I, there are not a lot of them around because the people that own them don’t want to sell them, and neither did the previous owner. The engine and rive in this car is awesome, and it’s almost summer now, I couldn’t think of a better car to take the top off on. 
The Z4 sDrive35i gets a twin-turbocharged 3.0-liter inline-6 that produces 300 hp and 300 lb-ft of torque. Coupled with a dual-clutch seven-speed automated gearbox. This car is quick, very quick, it also has aftermarket exhausts which sound simply amazing with this engine. Please do not compare this model Z4 to any other out there, this is the fastest Z4 produced. 
What makes this car special? 
•	For starters it’s the 35i motor, you can’t find them and most certainly not in this condition with these extra’s.
•	Aftermarket performance exhaust system 
•	Aftermarket alloy rims with brand new tyres 
•	Satellite navigation 
•	Full service history 
•	Paddle shift
•	PDC front and rear 
•	Carbon fibre vinyl interior 
•	Blue callipers 
•	Up dated badging all-round the vehicle 
And much more, you just have to come through and drive this vehicle to really appreciate it.
attributes.title: 2011 BMW Z4 sDrive35i Design Auto
